summary: HR professional with nearly 5 years of experience in HR operations, benefits, employee relations, HRIS, payroll, HR metrics, and employee database management. Strong communicator and negotiator with conflict resolution skills; experienced in developing and implementing HR plans and procedures with minimal guidance.

experience.title: HR/Payroll Consultant
experience.description: Managed compensation & benefits for 1300 employees; involved in Oracle HRMS implementation; gathered requirements and provided IT with documentation; documented process flows including Recruit-to-Retire, learning management, and iRecruitment; trained HR team on Oracle ERP; collaborated with IT to implement complex reports (HSSE, ERA, maternity act, provident fund); tested reports and ensured data integrity; led payroll integration for a newly acquired company.

experience.title: HR Consultant
experience.description: Handled end-to-end employment cycle from onboarding to exit formalities; processed monthly salary changes including merit increases, promotions, incentives, and pay adjustments; reconciled payroll and released payments on time; managed performance reviews; maintained HR data in Oracle; contributed to policy development and process improvements; produced regular HR metrics reports.

experience.title: Executive, HR & Payroll
experience.description: Single point of contact for 2000 employees across client engagements; managed recruitment phases (vacancy understanding, postings, screening, interviews); processed salary and ensured timely disbursement; reconciled payouts with accounts; prepared wage registers, muster rolls, and leave cards; maintained MIS for final settlements; acted as liaison between management and employees; used HRIS (SAP) for payroll and attendance; contributed to policy implementation and client relations.
